[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/mod.rs] [Function: generate_release_proposal_scripts()] [Directory Permission Check] No explicit permission checks before directory creation - can proposals be generated with wrong permissions allowing unauthorized modifications? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/mod.rs] [Function: get_signer_arg()] [Signer Authority] Returns different signer args based on mode - can testnet signers be used on mainnet or vice versa, bypassing authorization? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/components/mod.rs] [Constant: CORE_CODE_ADDRESS] [Privileged Address Validation] Uses CORE_CODE_ADDRESS for config fetching - is this address properly validated to ensure it hasn't been compromised or replaced? (High)
